name: Not Spy Hunter
description:
After a whole year of refining this game, it has finally reached something that actually looks better than it did before.

PLAY THE RACER OF A LIFETIME

Race down an infinite stretch of highway with only one goal: go as fast as possible. This is pretty much the only thing that you want to do. You only have one problem. Someone decided to put a bunch of roadblocks in your way, and send cars with the likeness of certain Ford Mustangs to shoot at you. I thought it'd look cool that way. Also, this game sort of looks like spy hunter, but it's not, it just happens to look that way.

USE INNOVATIVE CONTROLS

Just use the arrow (or cursor, if you like to say things differently from the rest of us) keys and space bar.

VIEW SORT OF UGLY GRAPHICS IN TWO DIMENSIONS

Man, this game looks pretty ugly.

I HAVE REMOVED THE SOUND

I'm still working on sound that's satisfying, so for now you'll have to endure pure silence.

I THINK IT HAS MOBILE SUPPORT

You can touch and drag to do stuff. It should work, I really haven't tested it. Let me know if there are any bugs!

IN DEVELOPMENT

So it's fairly obvious this game isn't finished. When will it be finished? I have no idea. I'll probably just keep adding stuff until I give up on it. If there's a bug, or something feels... off... be sure to leave a comment. I'll try to fix it when I have time.
